  • Constructor Details

    • Print

      public Print()
      Custom printer for Text User Interface, when initialized resets the color on the terminal

  • Method Details

    • playgroundPrinter

      public static void playgroundPrinter(Playground area, boolean coords, boolean spaces, boolean summary)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the whole playground eventually with row's and column's indexes
      Parameters:
      area - The playground object with bounds and the matrix of the space
      coords - Boolean to set true if we want to print also the coords
      spaces - Boolean to set true if we want 2 empty rows and 2 empty columns at the borders of the grid

    • playgroundPrinter

      public static void playgroundPrinter(Playground area)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the whole playground with row's and column's indexes, border space and resources / items summary, it's an overloading of the previous method
      Parameters:
      area - The playground object with bounds and the matrix of the space

    • cardPrinter

      public static void cardPrinter(Card card, boolean side)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the selected side of card using non-regular ascii characters
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui
      side - The side we want to display, true for front, false for back

    • cardPrinter

      public static void cardPrinter(Card card)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the current side of the card with non-regular ascii characters, it's an overloading of the previous method
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui

    • basicCardPrinter

      public static void basicCardPrinter(Card card, boolean side)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the selected side of card using regular ascii characters
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui
      side - The side we want to display, true for front, false for back

    • basicCardPrinter

      public static void basicCardPrinter(Card card)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the current side of the card with regular ascii characters, it's an overloading of the previous method
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui

    • smallCardPrinter

      public static void smallCardPrinter(Card card)
      Given a card, the function print its current side in a small version
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print

    • largeCardPrinter

      public static void largeCardPrinter(Card card, boolean side)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the selected side of card using non-regular ascii characters
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui
      side - The side we want to display, true for front, false for back

    • largeCardPrinter

      public static void largeCardPrinter(Card card)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints the current side of the card with non-regular ascii characters, it's an overloading of the previous method
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui

    • largeCardBothSidesPrinter

      public static void largeCardBothSidesPrinter(Card card)
      Printing function for text user interface, it prints both sides of the card with non-regular ascii characters
      Parameters:
      card - The card we want to print in the tui

    • inLineAchievementPrinter

      public static void inLineAchievementPrinter(ArrayList<AchievementCard> achCards)
      Printing function for text user interface, given an arraylist of achievement cards, it prints them all in a single row, showing only the front side
      Parameters:
      achCards - The arraylist containing the cards we want to be printed

    • inLineLargeCardsPrinter

      public static void inLineLargeCardsPrinter(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Printing function for text user interface, given an arraylist of cards, it prints them all in a single row showing their current side
      Parameters:
      cards - The arraylist containing the cards we want to be printed

    • largeHandPrinter

      public static void largeHandPrinter(ArrayList<Card> cards, ArrayList<AchievementCard> achievements)
      Given an array of cards, representing the hand of the player and an array of achievements, representing the secret and the common achievements, This method prints all the cards in two rows, one for each side
      Parameters:
      cards - The cards representing the hand of the player
      achievements - The achievement cards representing the achievement of the player

    • getPlayerColor

      public static String getPlayerColor(String player, ArrayList<Player> list, Player single)
      Given a player's name, this function return the special tui chars for its color
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player we want to obtain the color from
      list - arraylist of the players in the game
      single - player asking for color
      Returns:
      String of chars representing the color for tui

    • drawChoicePrinter

      public static void drawChoicePrinter(ArrayList<GoldCard> commonGold, ArrayList<ResourceCard> commonResource, Resource goldDeck, Resource resourceDeck)
      Given all the cards on the table, this function prints em for the tui
      Parameters:
      commonGold - arraylist representing the gold cards
      commonResource - arraylist representing the resource cards
      goldDeck - resource of the first card on top of the gold deck null if the deck is empty
      resourceDeck - resource of the first card on top of the resource deck null if the deck is empty

    • resultAsciiArt

      public static void resultAsciiArt(boolean win, String color)
      Method that prints an ascii art "YOU WON" or "YOU LOST" for the tui
      Parameters:
      color - String of chars for a specific color, null or "" for none

    • scoreboardPrinter

      public static void scoreboardPrinter(ArrayList<Player> players)
      This method prints the scoreboard for the tui showing the points of each player
      Parameters:
      players - the arraylist of players playing the game

    • scoreboardPrinter

      public static void scoreboardPrinter(ArrayList<Player> players, Player single)
      This method prints the scoreboard for the tui showing the points of each player It's an overloading of the previous method, to use for clients that save the own player in a different variable
      Parameters:
      players - the arraylist of players playing the game
      single - player invoking the method
